ScenarioDef.label: Dragonian Naked Brutality
ScenarioDef.description: After some questionable experiments, you are dumped at this back water planet. Being a Dragonian, although you have a strong body, you lack the knowledge of some critical skills. Are you able to survive?

scenario.summary: Naked, alone, and lacking critical skills. Can you survive?

li.text:
Being a Dragonian, life hasn't been easy. You started as an experiment, with the goal of creating stronger and better xenohuman.

Now after years of experiments, you are deemed as not reaching the expectation, and dumped on a distant rimworld.

Aside from a natural strong body, you have nothing at your disposal. Can you survive?
